org.sakaiproject.util

Class EntryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.MergedListEntryProviderBase
      • org.sakaiproject.util.EntryProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MergedList.EntryProvider

    public class EntryProvider
extends MergedListEntryProviderBase
    Provides a list of merged calendars by iterating through all available calendars. Optionally, can exclude user hidden sites.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntryProvider()
      Default constructor.
      EntryProvider(boolean excludeHiddenSites)
      Exclude hidden sites from user preferences.
